titleStmt.title: A proclamation anent carrying of arms
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Privy Council.
Scotland. Sovereign (1649-1685 : Charles II)

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Evan Tyler, Printer to the Kings most excellent Majesty,

notesStmt.note: Royal arms at head of text; initial letter.
Dated at end: Given under Our signet at Edinburgh, the ninth day of October, one thousand six hundred and sixty seven, and of Our Reign the nineteenth year.
Signed: Pet. Wedderburne, Cl. Sti. Concilii.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
